    Tung-I Chen

    Research Assistent,
    National Taiwan University

    • Tainan, Taiwan

    I am a research assistant at the Communications and Multimedia Lab, National Taiwan University (NTU). In my masterâ€™s study, I was fortunate to be advised by Prof. Winston Hsu. My research interest lies in developing generalizable models or algorithms that can tackle uncertainty under dynamic environments. I am highly interested in online optimization and sequential decision-making problems.
